channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- eSpace 7910; eSpace 7950; eSpace 8950
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- eSpace 7910; eSpace 7950; eSpace 8950

item.title: CVE-2017-17223|2024-08-05T20:44:00.244Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- espace%207910%3B%20espace%207950%3B%20espace%208950
item.description: Huawei eSpace 7910 V200R003C30; eSpace 7950 V200R003C30; eSpace 8950 V200R003C00; V200R003C30 have a directory traversal vulnerability. An authenticated, remote attacker can craft specific URL to the affected products. Due to insufficient verification of the URL, successful exploit will upload and download files and cause information leak and system crash.
